reviewText:
I have seen this on netflix long time ago and still remember some time along with another Chinese film "Blind shaft".  Both films are type of neo realist style, quiet and realistic, made in sincere way of film making, probably casted with not so well known actors or non actors.
If you like Bresson's film or Italian neo realism films, or just good films, I recommend to see these little gems if you got any chance.
